title: A "small" tweak for Pool Party MF pls.
body:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cGMm9m7.jpg[/img]

I know that the lower part of the body is supossed to be darker to create more of the illusion of perspective....but the contrast between the upper part and the legs is really strong.

replies.body: It could be a reference towards tan?
